message: Complete quiz data structure documented: ALL week files already have comprehensive explanation objects with correct/incorrect fields. No structural changes needed - only content additions required.

question_object.question: string - the quiz question text
question_object.answer: string - correct answer matching one option

explanation.correct: string - explanation for WHY the correct answer is right

incorrect.option1: string - why this wrong answer is incorrect
incorrect.option2: string - why this wrong answer is incorrect
incorrect.option3: string - why this wrong answer is incorrect

example_from_week1.question: Who founded the first experimental psychology laboratory?

explanation.correct: Wilhelm Wundt founded the first experimental psychology laboratory in Leipzig, Germany in 1879...

data.key_insight: EXPLANATION FIELDS ALREADY EXIST IN ALL FILES - Task is about content enrichment, not structure modification

message: Implementation guidance: Explanation structure is consistent across all weeks. Implementation team should preserve exact schema when adding/modifying explanations.

schema_to_preserve.correct: Single string field with 1-2 sentence explanation focusing on WHY the answer is correct
schema_to_preserve.incorrect: Object with keys matching wrong answer text, values are 1-2 sentence explanations for WHY each is wrong

validation_rules: Every question must have explanation object
explanation.incorrect must have exactly 3 keys (one per wrong answer)
Keys in incorrect object must match the wrong answer options exactly
data.reason: Structure already exists and is populated - task is content enhancement only
